title: Instagram Clone
description: This is a FullStack Instagram web app built using Next.js. This app uses Next.js 13 latest Server components and renders HTML on the server. MongoDB is used as the database and Next Auth is used for authentication. React Context API is used to store global app data.
features: Users can like and comment posts
Users can upload post
Google login functionality
All Images are hosted and uploaded to Azure cloud
SEO Friendly

title: Emart
description: This is a FullStack Ecommerce website built using React.js, Redux.js and Strapi as CMS to manage products. Frontend of this website is built using React.js, Redux and uses Strapi CMS for the backend. Data is communicated through Rest API.It uses Mysql for the database.
features: Add to Cart functionality
Google login feature
User friendly backend UI to manage products

title: Blog
description: This is a FullStack Blog website built using React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. It has a custom Login, password reset, and search post functionality. It has a dedicated Admin page where the users can create or update an existing post. The frontend and backend are interacting through API.
features: Image optimization using nodejs for blog images.
Create, update, delete feature for blog articles.
Reset and forgot password functionality
Currently deployed in Azure integrated with CI/CD pipeline.

title: Exam manager
description: Exam management web app used to automate the examination process of the university. This project is currently used by college to automate the examination process. Frontend of this application is built using React.js, Material UI and backend server is written in node.js, Express.js and database is Mysql. Frontend and backend are Interacting through Rest APIs.  Login credentials: [Admin - admin1@gmail.com], [Student - student1@gmail.com], [faculty - faculty1@gmail.com], [Staff - staff1@gmail.com] and Password is same for all i.e 123455
features: Dynamic PDF creation for hallticket generation, File upload and download feature.
This project has 5 user roles. Student, faculty, staff, admin, super admin.
Complex registration forms with multiple user Inputs.
Reset and forgot password functionality.

title: Chatapp
description: This is a whatsapp clone built using socket.io and nodejs in the backend and built using React.js in frontend.
features: Realtime communication using socket.io and nodejs
User profile image upload/change feature, Images are stored in Azure blob storage.
Beautiful and interactive user interface built using React.js
User Authentication using jsonwebtoken.

title: Covid Tracker
description: Covid Tracker is a frontend app used to track covid-19 Data across the world, This app is built using React.js. Data is served through the external API
features: Visual Representation of data using charts
Data is served through API.
Interactive user Interface

title: Photo Gallery
description: Photo Gallery is a frontend app used to search images. This app is built using React.js. Images are served from the Pixabay API.
features: Images are served from Pixabay API.
Search functionality
Interactive user Interface

title: Cryptoshorts
description: This is a crypto news website built using PHP and deployed on Wordpress CMS
features: User authentication feature
Create, update, delete blog articles in wordpress

title: Tech Store
description: Tech Store is a ecommerce app, built using React.js and new product can be added through Contentful headless CMS
features: Add or delete Items from the cart
Product checkout page with price calculator
Add or Update Product through Contentful API

title: Weather App
description: This is a weather app, It can search weather for the Particular city, It was built using Vanilla javascript, Weather data is being fetched from the external API
features: Display weather for City/town
City can be searched using city name and Country code
Icon Indicator for specific weather
